title: Beautiful ranch home on huge lot!
posting_body: HOUSE FOR RENT near Olde Towne Arvada!

Gorgeous 3bdr/2bath, living room w/fireplace, family room, reading nook/office space, lots of storage, huge yard, 2-car garage, 15 min to downtown and to to the mtns, very walkable and close to light rail stations.
Furniture can be negotiated for purchase or inclusion in rent (list price does not include furniture).
Tenant is responsible for all utilities.
Optional hot tub is available to tenants who agree to schedule and pay for monthly maintenance.
Landscaping and yard maintenance is Landlord’s responsibility.
Credit check, references, proof of income, and one month’s rent security deposit required.
